events.message: We received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position. The resume highlights strong development skills and relevant experience.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as developer, software, and engineer present in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to this application to proceed with the screening and scheduling of interviews.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening call, discussing the candidate's background, skills, and fit for the engineering developer position.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the initial screening, expressing enthusiasm about the role and willingness to proceed with technical interviews.
The technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for next week to assess coding skills and software development knowledge.
